meta_description: The Haan is a historic mansion and museum of historic and contemporary Indiana artists, including an impressive collection of works by TC Steele and the Hoosier Group.
hours_text:
#  Visit the Haan

### Museum Hours

Wednesday-Saturday  
1:00 - 4:00 PM

### Office Hours

Tuesday-Friday  
10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

### Sculpture Garden

The sculpture garden and nature trail, behind the museum are open every day from dawn to dusk, and are free for the public to enjoy. Please see "Garden & Grounds" for rules specific to these areas.

### Tour the Museum

**General****Admission: $12 adult / $6 youth (5-17)**

The museum is open Wednesday - Saturday from 1-4pm (closures are noted on the museum calendar on the home page of this site). You may want to allow about an hour to enjoy the museum. Volunteer docents are here to greet you and provide an overview of the museum and share some of the fascinating history of the building, art and furniture or let you discover the museum at your own pace. Feel free to ask questions!

[ Purchase Tour Tickets ](https://thehaan.org/tour-tickets/)

**Private and Group Tours**

Group tours, field trips, and specialty tours with a focused topic are available by advance appointment. Contact us to find out more at 765-742-6449 during office hours, Monday-Friday 10am-5pm, or fill out our request form [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd54hsqQlWnmoxNt6_CtZ3KKaqGvfE1bvJXq4FuLufpWJIxuQ/viewform) and we'll get back to you shortly. 

****Accessibility****

The Haan Museum is proud to announce that our historic mansion house features an accessibility ramp alongside the steps to the main entrance and a newly remodeled elevator cert...
